cab.content: (TKI5 DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY Off HIS BRITANNIC MAJ33TYJS GOVERNMENT).SgCKST. CABINET.C.P.4195.THE TURC0-G3EEK SITUATION. CO-OPBRATION Off DOMINIONS.ftParaphrase of telegram from the Governor-General of New Zealand to the Secretary of State for the Colonies, dated 16th September,1922. (Received, Colonial Offico 1.30 p.ra. 16th, Sept ember, 1922),(Circulated by the Secretary of Statr for the Colonies).Your telegram 16th September Pol losing from my Prime Minister for Prime Minister begins Government of New Zealand wish to associate themselves with action which is being taken and will send contingent.JELLICOB.2, Whitehall Gardens, S.W. 18th September, 1922.
